description:
Masaki Ryuuichi is Masato`s classmate, who instantly falls in love with Wakamatsu Miyuki when paying a visit to Masato`s house. Is relentless in his pursuit of Miyuki, even going so far as to fail his year-end exams in order to enter the same class as her. A "bad boy" character, who gets into fights, rides motorcycles, cons his friends, and likes to peep.
Source: AdachiFan
name: Masaki Ryuuichi
